error_counters.description: Complex value was not enclosed in brackets `[]` in the MCF.
user_actions: Check complex values in your MCF and make sure they are enclosed in brackets

error_counters.description: Complex value had less than 2 or more than 3 parts
user_actions: Check that all of your complex values have either 2 or 3 parts

error_counters.description: In a complex value with 2 parts, the part that was expected to be a number was not a number
Invalid latitude value; must be decimal degrees with an optional N/S suffix
Invalid longitude value; must be decimal degrees with an optional E/W suffix
Complex value in MCF, check the error message for the specific error
user_actions: Either the start or end components are wrong, or at least one of the components have to be a number. Check the error message you get.

error_counters.description: External ID reference could not be resolved.
error_counters.suffix_description: Property for which the ID could not be resolved.

error_counters.description: Resolving external IDs found different DCIDs.
error_counters.suffix_description: The properties that were found, separated by an underscore `_`

error_counters.description: MCF node missing typeOf property
Observation value must be either a number or text
MCF line was missing a colon to separate the property and the value
Value of `Node` prop either included a comma or started with a quote.
user_actions: Check the error message for the specific of the malformation.

error_counters.description: Found an entity name without the required E: prefix
Property found without a preceding line with 'Node'
The node could not be assigned a DCID based on the data available
error_counters.suffix_description: The typeOf value of the node (first value, if multiple)

error_counters.description: The local ID of the node is missing from the entire sub-graph
error_counters.suffix_description: The property this reference was found in

error_counters.description: The reference was resolved, but to a failed node, therefore, this node was also failed to resolve
error_counters.suffix_description: The property this reference was found in

error_counters.description: DCID included invalid characters.
error_counters.suffix_description: The property whose value included invalid chars

error_counters.description: A property was found that was not expected for the type of the Node
Found a missing or empty property value
error_counters.suffix_description: The missing property that was required.

error_counters.description: Found multiple values for single-value property
error_counters.suffix_description: The property with the multiple values

error_counters.description: Found a class reference that does not start with an upper-case
error_counters.suffix_description: The property, and optionally, the type of the node separated with an underscore (`_`) from the property.

error_counters.description: Found a property reference that does not start with a lower-case
error_counters.suffix_description: The property, and optionally, the type of the node separated with an underscore (`_`) from the property.
